mapper.select: SELECT memo_id AS memoId, trip_id AS tripId, user_id AS userId, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, content, seq, day FROM memo WHERE memo_id = #{memoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memo (trip_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at, content, seq, day) VALUES (#{tripId}, #{userId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{content}, #{seq}, #{day})
